nodes.bodyText: OK, my bad, I didn't know interceptors also applied to superclass methods, otherwise I'd have suggested to handle interface default methods too. Great move.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -186,6 +186,13 @@ public MethodVisitor visitMethod(int access, String name, String descriptor, Str
                         classLevelBindings, bytecodeTransformerConsumer, transformUnproxyableClasses));

nodes.bodyText:
Interface methods cannot be final.
It should be enough to call addInterceptedMethodCandidates() here.
